test_cases.name: Match all nodes in the graph

details.query: match (a) return a limit 5
match (p:Person) return p

test_cases.name: Filter nodes by single label and single property

details.query: match (p:Person {name: 'Tom Hanks'}) return p

test_cases.name: Filter nodes by multi label and single property

details.query: match (p:Person:Male {name: 'Tom Hanks'}) return p

match (g:GPO) optional match (g)-[r1:GPLink {enforced: false}]->(container1) with g, container1 optional match (g)-[r2:GPLink {enforced: true}]->(container2) with g, container1, container2 optional match p1 = (g)-[r1:GPLink]->(container1)-[r2:Contains*1..]->(n1:Computer) where none(x in nodes(p1) where x.blocksinheritance = true and labels(x) = 'OU') with g, p1, container2, n1 optional match p2 = (g)-[r1:GPLink]->(container2)-[r2:Contains*1..]->(n2:Computer) return p1, p2

test_cases.name: Match nodes by multi label and multi property

details.query: match (p:Person:Male {fname: 'Tom', lname: 'Hank'}) return p
match (p:Person) return p.name
match (p:Person) where p.name = $name return p.born
match (p:Person {value: $test}) where p.name = $1 and p.other in $array return p.name, p.born
match (p:Person) return p.fname, p.lname

test_cases.name: Filter nodes using WHERE clause with equality

details.query: match (p:Person) where p.name = 'Tom Hanks' return p

test_cases.name: Filter nodes using WHERE clause with < operator

details.query: match (p:Person) where p.age < 50 return p

test_cases.name: Filter nodes using WHERE clause with > operator

details.query: match (p:Person) where p.age > 50 return p

test_cases.name: Filter nodes using WHERE clause with <= operator

details.query: match (p:Person) where p.age <= 50 return p

test_cases.name: Filter nodes using WHERE clause with >= operator

details.query: match (p:Person) where p.age >= 50 return p

test_cases.name: Filter nodes using WHERE clause with not equal to

details.query: match (p:Person) where p.name <> 'Tom Hanks' return p

test_cases.name: Filter nodes using WHERE clause with disjunction

details.query: match (p:Person) where (p.fname = 'Tom' or p.fname = 'Brad') return p

test_cases.name: Filter nodes using WHERE clause with conjuction

details.query: match (p:Person) where p.fname = 'Tom' and p.lname = 'Hanks' return p

test_cases.name: Traverse relationship by specifying edge type, filter query using where clause

details.query: match (p:Person)-[:ACTED_IN]->(m:Movie) where p.name = 'Tom Hanks' return m

test_cases.name: Traverse relationship by specifying edge type, filter query using property matcher

details.query: match (p:Person {name: 'Tom Hanks'})-[:ACTED_IN]->(m:Movie) return m

test_cases.name: Traverse relationship by specifying multiple edge types

details.query: match (p:Person)-[:ACTED_IN|DIRECTED]->(m:Movie) return m
match (p:Person)-[]->(m:Movie) return m
match (p:Person)<-[]-(m:Movie) return m
match (p:Person)<-[]->(m:Movie) return m

test_cases.name: Filter query by specifying node labels in the where clause

details.query: match (p)-[:ACTED_IN]->(m) where p:Person and m:Movie and m.title = 'The Matrix' return p.name

test_cases.name: Filter using ranges in where clause

details.query: match (p:Person)-[:ACTED_IN]->(m:Movie) where 2000 < m.released < 2003 and 100 > m.last < 200 return p.name
match (p:Person) return p.born

test_cases.name: Filtering by existence of a property

details.query: match (n) where n.doesThisPropertyExist is not null return n

test_cases.name: Filter by string matching: prefix string search

details.query: match (p:Person) where p.name starts with 'tom' return p

test_cases.name: Filter by string matching: suffix string search

details.query: match (p:Person) where p.name ends with 'hanks' return p

test_cases.name: Filter by string matching: substring search

details.query: match (p:Person) where p.name contains 'tom h' return p
match (p:Person) where toLower(p.name) starts with 'tom' return p
match (p:Person) where toUpper(p.name) starts with 'tom' return p

test_cases.name: Filter by list inclusion: list literal of numeric values

details.query: match (p:Person) where p.born in [1965, 1970, 1975] return p.name, p.born

test_cases.name: Filter by list inclusion: list literal of string values

details.query: match (p:Person) where p.name in ["tom", "tommy", "thomas"] return p.name, p.born

test_cases.name: Filter by list inclusion: list comes from the edge property named `r.roles`

details.query: match (p:Person)-[r:ACTED_IN]->(m:Movie) where 'Neo' in r.roles return p.name

test_cases.name: Query for the properties of a node using keys()

details.query: match (p:Person) return p.name, keys(p)

test_cases.name: Query for the properties of an edge using keys()

details.query: match ()-[e:EDGE_OF_INTEREST]->() return keys(e)

test_cases.name: Specify alias in return clause with `AS`

details.query: match (n:Person) return n.property as renamedProperty

test_cases.name: Retrieve labels for a node using labels()

details.query: match (p:Person) return labels(p)
match (p:Person) return p order by p.born asc
match (p:Person) return p order by p.born desc
match (p:Person) return p order by p.year asc, p.name desc
match (p:Person) return p limit 100
match (p:Person) return p skip 100
match (p:Person) return p order by p.name asc skip 10 limit 10
match (p:Person)-[]->(m:Movie) return distinct p.name, m.title
match (m:Movie) return distinct m.title
match (p:Person) return count(*)
match (p:Person) return count(*) as total order by total desc
match (p:Person) return p.name, [p.born, p.died]

test_cases.name: Aggregation using collect() to return a list

details.query: match (p:Person)-[:ACTED_IN]->(m:Movie) return p.name, collect(m.title)
match (p:Person)-[:ACTED_IN]->(m:Movie) where m.year = 1920 return collect(distinct (m.title))
match (p:Person)-[:ACTED_IN]->(m:Movie) where p.name = 'tom cruise' return collect(m) as tomCruiseMovies
match p = shortestPath((p1:Person)<-[*]->(p2:Person)) where p1.name = 'tom' and p2.name = 'jerry' return p
match (b) where b.name is not null return b
match (b) where (b)<-[]->() return b
match (b) where not ((b)<-[]->()) return b
match (b) return b
match (a), (b {prop: a.name}) return a, b
match (n) where n.indexed >= 1 and n.other_1 = 2 return n
match (n) where n.indexed >= 1 and n.other_1 = 2 and n.other_2 = 3 return n
match (n) where n.indexed >= 1 and (n.other_1 = 2 or n.other_2 = 3) return n
match (n) where (n.indexed >= 1 or n.other_1 = 2) return n
match (n) where (n.indexed >= 1 or n.other_1 = 2 or n.other_2 = 3) return n
match (n) where n.name starts with '123' return n
match (n) where n.name contains '123' return n
match (n) where n.name ends with '123' return n
match (n) where id(n) = 1 return n
match (n)-[:NestedEdge*]->() where id(n) = 1 return n

test_cases.name: Match patterns with range literal with at least one edge

details.query: match (n)-[:NestedEdge*1..]->() where id(n) = 1 return n

test_cases.name: Match patterns with range literal with 1 to 2 edges

details.query: match (n)-[:NestedEdge*1..2]->() where id(n) = 1 return n

test_cases.name: Match patterns with where and return clauses

details.query: match (n {property: true})<-[r {property: n.name}]-(s)-[v]->() where n.indexed = false return n, r.other
match (n:Person) return distinct n
match (n) return n skip 1 limit 1
match (n:Person) return n order by n.name asc, n.other desc
match p = (n:Group)<-[:MemberOf*1..]-(m) where n.objectid =~ '(?i)S-1-5-.*-512' return p
match p = (n:Domain)-[]->(m:Domain) return p
match p = ()-[:DCSync|AllExtendedRights|GenericAll]->(:Domain {name: 'DOMAIN.PAIN'}) return p

test_cases.name: Principals with Foreign Domain Group Membership

details.query: match p = (n:Base)-[:MemberOf]->(m:Group) where n.domain = 'DOMAIN.PAIN' and m.domain <> n.domain return p

test_cases.name: Find Computers where Domain Users are Local Admin

details.query: match p = (m:Group {name: 'DOMAIN USERS@DOMAIN.PAIN'})-[:AdminTo]->(n:Computer) return p

test_cases.name: Find Computers where Domain Users can read LAPS passwords

details.query: match p = (Group {name: 'DOMAIN USERS@DOMAIN.PAIN'})-[:MemberOf*0..]->(g:Group)-[:AllExtendedRights|ReadLAPSPassword]->(n:Computer) return p

test_cases.name: Find All Paths from Domain Users to High Value Targets

details.query: match p = shortestPath((g:Group {name: 'DOMAIN USERS@DOMAIN.PAIN'})-[*1..]->(n {highvalue: true})) where g <> n return p

test_cases.name: Find all shortest paths to workstations where Domain Users can RDP

details.query: match p = allShortestPaths((g:Group {name: 'DOMAIN USERS@DOMAIN.PAIN'})-[:CanRDP]->(c:Computer)) where not (c.operatingsystem contains 'Server') return p

test_cases.name: Find Workstations where Domain Users can RDP

details.query: match p = (g:Group {name: 'DOMAIN USERS@DOMAIN.PAIN'})-[:CanRDP]->(c:Computer) where not (c.operatingsystem contains 'Server') return p

test_cases.name: Find Servers where Domain Users can RDP

details.query: match p = (g:Group {name: 'DOMAIN USERS@DOMAIN.PAIN'})-[:CanRDP]->(c:Computer) where c.operatingsystem contains 'Server' return p

test_cases.name: Find Dangerous Privileges for Domain Users Groups

details.query: match p = (m:Group)-[:Owns|GenericAll|GenericWrite|WriteOwner|WriteDacl|MemberOf|ForceChangePassword|AllExtendedRights|AddMember|HasSession|Contains|GPLink|AllowedToDelegate|CoerceToTGT|SameForestTrust|AllowedToAct|AdminTo|CanBackup|CanPSRemote|CanRDP|ExecuteDCOM|HasSIDHistory|AddSelf|DCSync|ReadLAPSPassword|ReadGMSAPassword|DumpSMSAPassword|SQLAdmin|AddAllowedToAct|WriteSPN|AddKeyCredentialLink|SyncLAPSPassword|WriteAccountRestrictions|GoldenCert|ADCSESC1|ADCSESC3|ADCSESC4|ADCSESC5|ADCSESC6a|ADCSESC6b|ADCSESC7|ADCSESC9a|ADCSESC9b|ADCSESC10a|ADCSESC10b|ADCSESC13|DCFor|SyncedToEntraUser]->(n:Base) where m.objectid ends with '-513' return p

test_cases.name: Find Domain Admins Logons to non-Domain Controllers

details.query: match (dc)-[r:MemberOf*0..]->(g:Group) where g.objectid ends with '-516' with collect(dc) as exclude match p = (c:Computer)-[n:HasSession]->(u:User)-[r2:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group) where g.objectid ends with '-512' and not (c in exclude) return p
match (n:Product) return n.value + n.other_value as combined
match (n:Product) return n.value - n.other_value as combined
match (n:Product) return n.value * n.other_value as combined
match (n:Product) return n.value / n.other_value as combined
match (n:Product) return n.value % n.other_value as combined
match (n:Product) return n.value ^ n.other_value as combined
match (n:Product) return 1 - 2 / 2 * 100 as combined
match (n:Product) return 1 + 2 % 3 + n.prop_1 ^ n.prop_2 - 300.124 / 2 * 100 as combined

test_cases.name: Support unary operators in property match

details.query: match (n:Product) where n.prop_1 = -1 return n

test_cases.name: Support complex arithmetic expressions with unary operators in property match

details.query: match (n:Product) where n.prop_1 = -(1 + 2) * -3 return n

test_cases.name: Find Kerberoastable Users with most privileges

details.query: match (u:User {hasspn: true}) optional match (u)-[:AdminTo]->(c1:Computer) optional match (u)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(:Group)-[:AdminTo]->(c2:Computer) with u, collect(c1) + collect(c2) as tempVar unwind tempVar as comps return u.name, count(distinct (comps)) order by count(distinct (comps)) desc

test_cases.name: Find Kerberoastable Members of High Value Groups

details.query: match p = shortestPath((n:User)-[:MemberOf]->(g:Group)) where g.highvalue = true and n.hasspn = true return p

test_cases.name: Shortest Paths to Unconstrained Delegation Systems

details.query: match p = shortestPath((n)-[:HasSession|AdminTo|Contains|AZLogicAppContributor*1..]->(m:Computer {unconstraineddelegation: true})) where not (n = m) return p
match p = shortestPath((n)-[:HasSession|AdminTo|Contains|AZLogicAppContributor*1..]->(m:Computer {unconstraineddelegation: true})) where not (n = m) return p

test_cases.name: Shortest Paths to Domain Admins from Kerberoastable Users

details.query: match p = shortestPath((n:User {hasspn: true})-[:HasSession|AdminTo|Contains|AZLogicAppContributor*1..]->(m:Group {name: 'DOMAIN ADMINS@DOMAIN.PAIN'})) return p
match p = shortestPath((n:User {hasspn: true})-[:HasSession|AdminTo|Contains|AZLogicAppContributor*1..]->(m:Group {name: 'DOMAIN ADMINS@DOMAIN.PAIN'})) return p

test_cases.name: Shortest Paths to High Value Targets

details.query: match p = shortestPath((n)-[*1..]->(m {highvalue: true})) where m.domain = 'DOMAIN.PAIN' and m <> n return p
match (a:Person), (b:Company), (c:LegalFirm) return *

test_cases.name: Shortest Paths from Domain Users to High Value Targets

details.query: match p = shortestPath((g:Group {name: 'DOMAIN USERS@DOMAIN.PAIN'})-[*1..]->(n {highvalue: true})) where g.objectid ends with '-513' and g <> n return p

test_cases.name: Find Shortest Paths to Domain Admins

details.query: match p = shortestPath((n)-[:HasSession|AdminTo|Contains|AZLogicAppContributor*1..]->(m:Group {name: 'DOMAIN ADMINS@DOMAIN.PAIN'})) where not (n = m) return p

test_cases.name: Find Shortest Paths to Domain Admins with Traversal Limit

details.query: match p = shortestPath((n)-[:HasSession|AdminTo|Contains|AZLogicAppContributor*5..1]->(m:Group {name: 'DOMAIN ADMINS@DOMAIN.PAIN'})) where not (n = m) return p

test_cases.name: Find Computers with Unsupported Operating Systems

details.query: match (n:Computer) where n.operatingsystem =~ '(?i).*(2000|2003|2008|xp|vista|7|me).*' return n
match (n:User) where n.hasspn = true return n
match (u:User {dontreqpreauth: true}) return u
